user_input: Modify the TJ Sectoral Model. Perform a web-search to find how much e-kerosene and e-methanol can be imported into Europe in 2050, in Tj/hr. Add 2 new Gas Nodes 1 called 'e-kerosene import' and the other 'e-methanol import'. Add 2 new Gas Fields 1 called 'e-kerosene import' and the other 'e-methanol import' (when the pipeline gets to adding properties, use the data from the web-search as a dependency). Add 2 new Gas Pipelines From 'BE01' to 'e-kerosene import' and 'e-methanol import'. Use an unlimited capacity.
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the TJ Sectoral Model specifications.

function_args.query: 2050 European import potential of e-kerosene and e-methanol expressed in Tj/hr

tasks.description: Search the web for the 2050 European import potential of e-kerosene and e-methanol expressed in Tj/hr.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Retrieve information from external sources based on the query.

tasks.description: Create a Gas Node named 'e-kerosene import' in the 'TJ Sectoral Model'.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', create a new Gas Node object.

tasks.description: Create a Gas Node named 'e-methanol import' in the 'TJ Sectoral Model'.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', create a new Gas Node object.

tasks.description: Create a Gas Field named 'e-kerosene import' in the 'TJ Sectoral Model'.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', create a new Gas Field object.

tasks.description: Create a Gas Field named 'e-methanol import' in the 'TJ Sectoral Model'.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', create a new Gas Field object.

tasks.description: Update properties of Gas Field 'e-kerosene import' to set its import capacity/availability in Tj/hr using the web-search results.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', update the properties of the specified Gas Field.

tasks.description: Update properties of Gas Field 'e-methanol import' to set its import capacity/availability in Tj/hr using the web-search results.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', update the properties of the specified Gas Field.

tasks.description: Create a Gas Pipeline object linking 'BE01' to 'e-kerosene import' in the 'TJ Sectoral Model'.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', create a new Gas Pipeline object.

tasks.description: Update properties of the Gas Pipeline connecting 'BE01' to 'e-kerosene import' to set capacity to unlimited.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', update the properties of the specified Gas Pipeline.

tasks.description: Create a Gas Pipeline object linking 'BE01' to 'e-methanol import' in the 'TJ Sectoral Model'.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', create a new Gas Pipeline object.

tasks.description: Update properties of the Gas Pipeline connecting 'BE01' to 'e-methanol import' to set capacity to unlimited.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', update the properties of the specified Gas Pipeline.
